title: Community Details does not load
body:
1. Created open community while connected to Waku v2 prod fleet with `StatusIm-210919-232959-7f0e39-pr3513.AppImage`
2. Extracted community private key, backed up account seed words
3. Deleted `~/.config/Status` folder
4. Started `StatusIm-Desktop-v0.3.0-beta-a8c37d.AppImage`
5. Enable community, setup waku v2 prod, app stops. Restart app.
5. Re-imported account
6. Re-imported community
7. Community details do not load: no image, no channels.

Note: I am able to find the community details on the network using js-waku.

Log when starting v.0.3.0 App again and clicking on my community icon:

